EmailCollector – Your Essential Email Discovery Tool

Effortlessly extract and save email addresses from any website you visit with EmailCollector. Ideal for researchers, recruiters, and marketing/business professionals, this extension helps you quickly gather contact information while you browse, with powerful features designed to simplify your workflow.

Features:
  -  Automatic Email Extraction: Instantly fetches all visible and hidden email addresses from the page’s source code, capturing email addresses that might not be displayed directly on the website.
  -  Flexible Storage Options:
        -  Free Tier: Store up to 50 emails directly in your browser storage.
        -  Premium Tier: Unlock unlimited cloud storage for secure backup and access to new features.
  -  One-Click Export: Save your collected emails to CSV, JSON, TXT, or clipboard for easy integration into other tools.
  -  Duplicate Removal: Automatically filters out duplicate email addresses, so you only get unique contacts.

Why Choose EmailCollector?
  -  No Ads, No Spam: EmailCollector is focused on simplicity and functionality, free from intrusive ads or unnecessary features.
  -  Affordable Alternative: A cost-effective option compared to other email-finding tools, with premium cloud storage starting at just $7/month.
  -  Data Privacy: Collected emails and your browsing data is never shared.

Use Cases:
  -  Job Hunting: Gather contact information for potential employers or recruiters.
  -  Sales & Marketing: Quickly build a list of leads while researching potential clients.
  -  Academic Research: Collect contact emails from publications or university sites.

Pricing:
  -  Free: browser-based storage, limit of 50 saved emails.
  -  Premium: $7/month - Unlimited cloud storage with access to new features.

________________________________________

Use EmailCollector responsibly – we discourage using it for unsolicited marketing.
For more details and support, click the “About” button within the extension.
